page.title: 05News
page.content: Gedney Hill local television programmes are on BBC's Look North and Look East programmes and the ITV programmes Anglia and Yorkshire television. The Spalding papers are the Free Press and the Guardian which are printed in Spalding.The local papers are the Standard, which comes from Wisbech and the Evening Telegraph,the most popular paper,which is printed in Peterborough.The Spalding Herald is an advertising paper which is printed once a month.The Evening Telegraph is printed every night and the Guardian and Free Press once a week.The nearest Radio Station is in Peterborough.It is the Hereward Radio Station which is the most popular because it advertises. Radio Lincolnshire and Radio Cambridge do not advertise things like Hereward.
